channel.title: PSReadLine on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in PSReadLine on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: Announcing PSReadLine â€“ A bash-inspired readline implementation for PowerShell
item.description: Jason Shirk is back! He just announced the release of his new PowerShell project PSReadLine. In PowerShell 3.0, a hook was added to replace the command line editing experience in the console and Jason wrote a new module to take advantage of this hook.
